lead_paragraph: LAMBIRIS--John. Much-loved husband, father, and grandfather passed away June 4, 2016 at 88. Viewing Wednesday, June 8, at Holy Trinity Cathedral, 319 East 74th Street, at 9am, funeral services at 10am. Donations, in lieu of flowers, may be sent to The Cathedral School, 319 East 74th Street. 1/3
